summary: Web application for museum reporting with user management. User permissions are being managed at /users route.
architectural_notes: User management and permissions handled at /users route

existing_features.title: On the User Management page (/users), verify that the role display and edit dropdown correctly reflects the updated roles â€” i.e., no user should appear as 'Coordenador Geral' after the backend migration. If the 'Coordenador Geral' option still appears in the role selection dropdown, remove it or disable it so new users cannot be assigned that role.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change all user permissions from 'coordenador geral' to 'coordenador' in the users page

In the backend, update all existing user profiles that currently have the role 'generalCoordinator' (coordenador geral) and change their role to 'coordinator' (coordenador). This must affect every user with that role, not just a specific individual.
